name: Abyss (itch) (Zyhru)
description:
Abyss.

Stuck in a lab full of mysterious enemies. Must be aware of your health and your chaos meter otherwise you fall into the abyss.

OBJECTIVE:

You must try to stay alive and survive waves as they get harder every time.

CONTROLS:

"WASD" for movement.

ESC to pause the game.

Blue hearts fill up your meter.

Red hearts fill up your health

You can switch weapons when equipped from 1 to 3.
